emuInput.TitMainTitle: 1956 City of Pittsburgh marbles champion, Joseph Eugene Gordon, wearing crown and shaking hands with James F. Buzzelli, with director of Broad Community Center Adam L. Schillinger standing in center
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 9, 1956, pg. A29, reads: "MARBLES CHAMP - Joseph Eugene Gordon, right, of Scully Rd., East End, city marbles champion, is being congratulated by Adam L. Schillinger, director, Broad Community Center, and James F. Buzzelli, 3635 Old Orchard Circle, left companion with whom Joseph practiced. - Harris Photo."
